resources.string: About the Author: Application written by Katelyn Kim and Eric Wang

Rules: Hunt all the zombies in the graveyard. Click on a cell to reveal if a zombie is there. If no zombie is present, a number appears indicating the total number of remaining zombies in that row and column. Clicking on a cell without a zombie hidden results counts a missed shot. Try to hunt all the zombies using the fewest number of missed shots.
Note: The in-game zombie images and sound effects came from: https://www.font-generator.com, https://pixabay.com, https://www.shutterstock.com https://www.zapsplat.com/
